name: Somewhere (Aozo, Florian T, Dr Umbrus, LastGhazo)
name_original: Somewhere (Aozo, Florian T, Dr Umbrus, LastGhazo)
description:
A contemplation game where the world litteraly explode when you press Start, it's now up to you to repair it from nothing. Your choices will structure how the world will look and how different living beings will come to life.

This Game was created during Global Game Jam 2020
